Duration [[@actor.flags.pf2e.limit-rank]] round(s)

You raise your shield aloft, where it glows with unearthly brightness. You @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.xjGwis0uaC2305pm]{Raise a Shield}, and for the next number of rounds equal to your Limit Rank, it remains raised without you having to spend an action.

Whenever you use the Shield Block reaction while this effect is active, your shieldâ€™s hardness counts as [[3 * @actor.flags.pf2e.limit-rank]] points higher. If you are not currently wielding or wearing a shield, you instead gain a +2 circumstance bonus to your AC until the beginning of your next turn.
